name: Walls (Moon Light Games)
description:
4am me is pretentious AF

Something I made one night and polished a bit the day after. Don't expect too much ;)  This is one of those artsy-fartsy games with ambiguous meanings; I wanted to try and incorporate some things I was thinking about at night into a game and see what'd happen.

Tiny hint: the game ends after you walk off the staircase

Good luck!

Textures from: www.Textures.com
